section.title: The Windows Installation procedure
section.p: Download the lattest windows EXE Installer from source forge (note the version you need to download for your organiser)
Connect your organiser to windows via Active Sync
Backup your organiser for extra safety (Backup from Windows Active Sync or other prefered method
Follow the prompts on windows first for installation and then on the organiser
Restart (see operating instructions) the orgasier to get full suport for fonts and Start Page
Choose Simulator from your Today screen
Now have a play. Review the Quick Start Guide for more informaiton on what to do next.
